languages.text: "Я передумал{mf||а}. Дозволяю тебе вступить в мою свиту".
languages.translation_comment: здесь тень не в смысле ранга, а в смысле "будет идти за нами, прикрывать, охранять"
здесь тень не в смысле ранга, а в смысле "будет идти за нами, прикрывать, охранять"

languages.text: "I have changed my mind. I will permit you to accompany my retinue."
languages.original_text: "Я передумал{mf||а}. Дозволяю тебе вступить в мою свиту".

traits.locale_text: "I have changed my mind. I permit you to join my retinue."
"I have changed my mind. I permit you to join my retinue."
"I have changed my mind. I will permit you to accompany my retinue."
"I have changed my mind. I will permit you to accompany my retinue."
"I have changed my mind. I will permit you to accompany my retinue."
"I have changed my mind. I will permit you to accompany my retinue."

languages.text: «He cambiado de idea. Le permitiré acompañar a mi séquito».
languages.original_text: "I have changed my mind. I will permit you to accompany my retinue."

traits.locale_text: «He cambiado de idea. Le permitiré acompañar a mi séquito».

languages.text: 「考えが変わった。私の従者に同行する許可を与えよう」
languages.original_text: "I have changed my mind. I will permit you to accompany my retinue."

traits.locale_text: 「考えが変わった。私の従者に同行する許可を与えよう」

languages.text: “我改主意了，我允许你加入我的队伍。”
languages.original_text: "I have changed my mind. I will permit you to accompany my retinue."

traits.locale_text: “我改主意了，我允许你加入我的队伍。”

languages.text: "Ich habe es mir anders überlegt. Ich werde Euch gestatten, mein Gefolge zu begleiten."
languages.original_text: "I have changed my mind. I will permit you to accompany my retinue."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe es mir anders überlegt. Ich werde Euch gestatten, mein Gefolge zu begleiten."

languages.text: « J'ai changé d'avis. Je vous autorise à rejoindre mon entourage. »
languages.original_text: "I have changed my mind. I will permit you to accompany my retinue."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai changé d'avis. Je vous autorise à rejoindre mon entourage. »

languages.text: "Fikrimi değiştirdim. Maiyetimde bana eşlik etmene izin vereceğim."
languages.original_text: "I have changed my mind. I will permit you to accompany my retinue."
